abstract: Justice Gregory Carro of State Supreme Court in Manhattan offers plea deal of three to nine years in prison to Franklin Reyes Jr, teenage driver accused of killing 4-year-old Ariel Russo while fleeing the police; deal, which hinges on guilty plea for manslaughter, is more generous than that sought by prosecutors.
lead_paragraph: Justice Gregory Carro offered Franklin Reyes Jr., accused of killing Ariel Russo last year while fleeing the police on the Upper West Side, a lighter sentence in exchange for a guilty plea.
snippet: Justice Gregory Carro offered Franklin Reyes Jr., accused of killing Ariel Russo last year while fleeing the police on the Upper West Side, a lighter sentence in exchange for a guilty plea.

headline.main: Manhattan Judge Offers Deal to Driver Who Killed Girl, 4
headline.print_headline: Judge Offers Deal to Driver Who Killed Girl
